Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: Churros and waffles aren't fresh, maybe even 3 days old. Churros were greasy and tasted really bad

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: Microwave food, expensive, bad taste

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: The Belgium waffles with the chocolate and whip cream was perfect. I wanted to go to a coffeeshop just to get the munchies so that I could come back

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: Amazing waffles!! Best in Amsterdam!!! They are the only place I know that makes them fresh! I would highly recommend their gelato too. Two thumbs up!

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: Refused to freshly squeeze her "fresh squeezed" orange juice.  Claimed their credit card machine was broken.  Churros were topo greasy.. Didn't taste good or fresh.

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: Best brownie I have ever had, I bought the white chocolate oreo brownie and would recommend this place to everyone üëç

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: Worth trying. The Stroopwafels are supposedly a local dessert, kinda like a hybrid waffle and thin pancake with caramel in the middle

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: Dry expensive waffle

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: Great waffles, "poovertjes" and icecream by international standards :-) . Always a pleasure, very friendly staff!

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: yet another one of the tasteless yucky tourist traps that are taking over the city center. stay away unless you're having a terrible munchies.

Name: Sugar 'n Bakery
Review Text: Yummy.  Very high quality treats and friendly.

Review Text: Overpriced food, not so nice service
